column4: Anyone here use Openbox? I use it (no GNOME) and can't find out how to get a sleep function working?

sleep is once of those  issues with Linux,   well depends on the computer,   but you can probably configure  it and get it working if you know how,  also I expect not many people that use Ubuntu use OpenBox,   your issue  is  kind of general so could give  ##linux a try as well
